scripts.build: webpack --mode production && del /s /f /q "../Workflow_Engine_Web/src/main/resources/static/dist" && (robocopy /e "dist" "../Workflow_Engine_Web/src/main/resources/static/dist") ^& IF %ERRORLEVEL% LEQ 1 exit 0
scripts.dev: webpack --mode development && del /s /f /q "../Workflow_Engine_Web/src/main/resources/static/dist" && (robocopy /e "dist" "../Workflow_Engine_Web/src/main/resources/static/dist") ^& IF %ERRORLEVEL% LEQ 1 exit 0
